fields.prompt: Why do you want to join our coop?
When did you first hear about or visit 3cross?
What do you think your membership investment would be best spent on?
If you were referred to the co-op by a current member, enter their name here.

This is important, please read carefully! Massachusetts law prohibits ownership of a manufacturer of alcoholic beverages by anyone who has an ownership interest in either a retailer or wholesaler of alcoholic beverages. I affirm that I have no beneficial interest, directly or indirectly, in any business licensed under MGL c138 §§12 (retail on-premise), MGL c138 §§15 (retail off-premise) and no more than one business licensed under MGL c138 §§18 (wholesaler). If you have any question as to whether this applies to you, please ask before submitting this application.

I hereby apply for membership in 3cross Fermentation Cooperative under the terms and conditions of consumer membership contained in the Bylaws and amendments thereto, and the regulations enacted by the Board of Directors.
What skills, expertise or other qualities would you be interested in sharing with the coop?
